title: Amazon FBA Product Research VA – Online Arbitrage & Wholesale
job_overview:
Hi there! 

I run a growing Amazon FBA business and I’m looking for a reliable, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to help with product research for Online Arbitrage and Wholesale. This is a long-term opportunity for the right person.

You’ll be responsible for finding low-cost, high-profit products from reliable sources that meet specific criteria. All products must be ungated (no application or approval required to sell), with low competition and a solid sales history.

If you’ve done this kind of work before and love finding winning products, I’d love to work with you!

What You’ll Do:
Daily product research for Online Arbitrage and Wholesale

Find ungated products (no need to apply to sell)

Source from trusted online retailers or wholesale suppliers

Look for low-cost products (under $30) with high ROI

Analyse products using tools like Keepa, SAS, Amazon Revenue Calculator, etc.

Prepare clean and organized spreadsheets with full product details:

ASIN, Product Title, Buy Cost, Sell Price, ROI, Profit

Source Link

Gating Status

Avoid products with IP complaints or high return risk

What You Need to Have:
Experience with Amazon FBA product research (Online Arbitrage and/or Wholesale)

Knowledge of Keepa, SellerAmp SAS, and basic Amazon profit calculations

Ability to find products that can be sold without brand or category approval

Attention to detail and ability to follow criteria strictly

Good written English and communication skills

Strong internet connection and reliable computer

Bonus if You Have:
Experience with Tactical Arbitrage or OAXray

Wholesale supplier sourcing experience

Familiarity with IP Alert tools or brand restrictions

What I Offer:
Long-term, stable work with room to grow

Performance bonuses for successful product finds

Flexible hours

Friendly, supportive working relationship

How to Apply:
Please send me the following:

A short intro about your experience with Amazon FBA and product research

List of tools you’ve used (Keepa, SAS, etc.)

A sample spreadsheet or report of previous product research you’ve done

Confirmation that you can find ungated products suitable for selling on Amazon

I look forward to working with someone who’s passionate, focused, and ready to grow with my business. If that’s you — let’s talk!
